Spanish Example: Cuando era joven, yo trabajaba mucho.
English Translation: When I was young, I used to work a lot.
You used to work in a shop, right?

Spanish Example: Ella trabajaba los fines de semana.
English Translation: She used to work on weekends.

Spanish Example: Nosotros trabajábamos juntos en el proyecto.
English Translation: We used to work together on the project.

Spanish Example: Vosotros trabajabais en el jardín cada día.
English Translation: You all (Spain) used to work in the garden every day.
They used to work in an office.
As a child, I used to eat a lot of candy.

Spanish Example: ¿Tú comías en casa o en la escuela?
English Translation: Did you eat at home or at school?
My grandmother used to eat early.
We always used to eat together on Sundays.
You all (Spain) used to eat very late.

Spanish Example: Los niños comían mientras veían televisión.
English Translation: The kids were eating while watching TV.

Spanish Example: Vivía en Madrid cuando era pequeño.
English Translation: I lived in Madrid when I was little.

Spanish Example: Mi padre vivía en un pueblo.
English Translation: My father used to live in a village.
We used to live near the park.
You all (Spain) used to live in Spain, right?
